brief_description: 2 different stimuli were used to activated DCs  LPS and Curdlan.   A time course experiment was conducted for 2 hr to measure the phosphorylation profiles of MAPKs, ERK1/2 and p38.
brief_title: Phosphorylation profiles of ERK, p38, MAPKs in DCs in response to different pathogenic stimuli
description: 2 different stimuli were used to activated DCs  LPS and Curdlan.   A time course experiment was conducted for 2 hr to measure the phosphorylation profiles of MAPKs, ERK1/2 and p38.
hypothesis: DCs have different repsonses to different stimuli.
objectives: Define phosphoryaltion profiles of DCs after stimulation
official_title: Phosphorylation profiles of ERK, p38, MAPKs in DCs in response to different pathogenic stimuli

arm.description: DCs from healthy subjects used in in vitro studies
